Title: MetroRate
Description: MetroRate is a control for displaying ratings with stars in Windows 8 WinRT Metro XAML apps.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

MetroRate is a rating control for Windows 8 WinRT Metro XAML apps.

It's a modified open source WPF control released on CodeProject:

Sacha Barber: http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/45210/WPF-A-Simple-Yet-Flexible-Rating-Control

To download and install the project, use NuGet.

PM> Install-Package MetroRate

MetroRate is released under Ms-PL. It's as-is. I am not responsible if something breaks. Enjoy!
